
name(Let the Dream Begin)

snap(20,0,-30)

sky(196,230,255)
fog(206,222,216)
ground(202,209,196)
polys(201,204,177)

fadefrom(5000)
density(3)

nlaps(3)


set(48,0,0,0)p
set(15,0,5600,180)p
